settings.label: Optimize CSS
settings.info: Enable this option to get best performance. 99 points from Google PageSpeed Tools for some our demos. But it will show HTML validation errors at https://validator.w3.org/. Make smart choice.
You can use standard fonts, for this write the name of the standard font in the line 'Name'. Example: Tahoma, Verdana, Segoe, sans-serif

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting]({{ site.url }}/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To offer multiple languages for you customer, you must create and configure separate store per each language. (This is Shopify software limitation)

settings.label: Enable language switcher
settings.info: Select navigation menu to show language list.

settings.label: Fill list at Navigation section at Admin panel
Set open date
settings.info: Use date format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +zz:xx', where YYYY - 4 digits year, MM - 2 digits month, DD - 2 digits day, HH - 2 digits hour, SS - 2 digits second, zz - timezone hour, xx - timezone minute. For example 2018-12-24 00:00:00. 24 December of 2018 at midnight by London time.

settings.content: CSS and JS code to be kept separately.
